      void postMail(String[] recipients, String subject, String message, String from)
      Constructs an email and sends it the desired recipients.
      void postMail(String[] recipients, String subject, String message, String from, String[] cc) 

    • Method Detail

      • postMail

        void postMail(String[] recipients,
              String subject,
              String message,
              String from)
       throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Constructs an email and sends it the desired recipients.
        Parameters:
        recipients - An array containing the email addresses of the recipients.
        subject - The subject of the email message.
        message - The body of the email message.
        from - The 'from' email address.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException
